definition: no pain, no gain (idiom)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to catch/to obtain/to capture
to reap/to harvest

sentences.english: He came from the “No pain, no gain” school of horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 他来自一个“不劳无获”的园艺学校。

sentences.english: He came from the “No pain, no gain” school of 3)horticulture.
sentences.chinese: 他来自一个“不劳无获”的园艺学校。

definition: you get what you put in/you reap what you sow
pinyin: yi1 fen1 geng1 yun2 , yi1 fen1 shou1 huo4

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: Heaven rewards the diligent. (idiom)
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain
pinyin: chi1 de2 ku3 zhong1 ku3 , fang1 wei2 ren2 shang4 ren2
related.word: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人

definition: to reap without sowing (idiom)
Failure is the mother of success.
pinyin: shi1 bai4 shi4 cheng2 gong1 zhi1 mu3

definition: lit. Sow melon and you get melon, sow beans and you get beans (idiom); fig. As you sow, so shall you reap./One must live with the consequences of one's actions./You've made your bed, now must lie on it.
pinyin: zhong4 gua1 de2 gua1 , zhong4 dou4 de2 dou4

definition: there is no gain without a loss (idiom)/there is no such thing as a free meal
pinyin: you3 suo3 de2 bi4 you3 suo3 shi1

definition: lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 天下无难事，只怕有心人

definition: Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

definition: (in) return/reciprocation/payback/retaliation/to report back/to reciprocate
wise saying/words of wisdom
effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)
lit. piling up dirt eventually creates a mountain (idiom)/fig. success is the cumulation of lots of small actions
